name: Ecological Momentary Assessment (EMA) Assistant
description: A REDCap EM designed to create and manage surveys using the ecological momentary assessment method

project-settings.name: When checked, this config file will be used for source of windows/schedules. Otherwise, the config builder will be used.

Field which stores the cell phone to send texts
Field in project which stores cell phone number used to text.

Event which stores the cell phone to send texts
Event in project which the cell phone field resides.

sub_settings.name:
Window Name
Must be unique for each window and should not be changed after instantiated for records

Window Trigger Logic
If set, the window will only be instantiated if this is true and the start field below is configured. Leave blank and then any value in the start field below will cause the window to be instantiated for a record

Window Start Date Field
This is a date field that is day 0 for the window. This is required to calculate times of messages

Window Start Date Event
If specified, this is event where field above resides. This is required for longitudinal projects

Window Opt Out Field
If specified, this field must be equal to 1 (e.g. a calc field of 1) in order for notifications to be inhibited for this window

Window Opt Out Event
If Window Opt Out is specified and this is a longitudinal project, this event, where field above resides, is required

Window Days
A comma-separated list of day numbers from the Start Field (which is day 0). e.g. 1,2,3,4,5,6,7

Repeating Survey Form
Name of the form

Repeating Survey Event
Name of the event where the form above resides

Schedule Name
Name of schedule from next section that should be instantiated on this window

Default Daily Schedule Start Time
Enter minutes from midnight as the default schedule start time of each day, e.g. 8AM would be 60*8 = 480

Custom Start Time Offset Field
If specified, the start-time for a given record can be customized. The field is the number of minutes from midnight when first EMA event of the day should begin

Custom Start Time Offset Event
If Custom Start Time Offset is specified, this is event where field above resides

Text for message to send with survey link
Message for original text message

Text for reminder 1 message
Message for Reminder 1 text message

Text for reminder 2 message
Message for Reminder 2 text message

Schedule Name
Should be unique

Offsets
A comma-separated list of minute offsets between EMA windows (e.g. 0,240,480,720)

Randomize Window
If entered, offsets will be randomized between 0 minutes and this many minutes. e.g. a value of 60 will randomize the initial event by up to an hour from the offset.

Reminders
A comma-separated list of reminder times (e.g. 5,10). Code is currently setup for 1 or 2 reminders only.

Event Close Offset
Enter the number of minutes from initial invitation when the EMA window will end (e.g. 20). New survey entries after this time will not be allowed

Schedule length
Enter the length of the window
